docs.text: Home Obsidian Fantasy Calendars is a plugin that allows you to create any calendar you can dream of, inspired by the wonderful Fantasy Calendar website. Want a calendar with 1 month and 37 weekdays? You can do that! Want a calendar with 37 months and 1 weekday? You can do that too! Want a highly-functional real-world calendar that can automatically detect events inside your notes? You can even do that!
docs.title: Home
